sentences.en: Burning implies the combustion of other elements with oxygen to form compounds.
sentences.cn: 氧化意味着别的元素与氧形成化合物.

sentences.en: Carbon dioxide does not burn, nor does It'support combustion.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳不能燃烧, 它也不能助燃.

sentences.en: Carbon dioxide results from complete combustion of carboncontaining compounds.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳是由含碳化合物的完全燃烧产生的.

sentences.en: During incomplete combustion some of the hydrocarbon fuel is cracked.
sentences.cn: 在不完全的燃烧中,一些烃燃料裂解.

sentences.en: Engineers are still trying to come up with a commercially viable replacement for internal - combustion engines.
sentences.cn: 工程师在设法制造一种在商业上切实可行的发动机来取代内燃机.

sentences.en: If the combustion, just heat is let out to the fuel.
sentences.cn: 如果燃烧, 燃料就放出热.

sentences.en: In 1963, we evaluated an infrared vacuum combustion, gas heating system.
sentences.cn: 在1963年, 我们使用了内燃真空燃烧器的煤气加热系统.

sentences.en: Soot is the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: Soot is usually the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟通常是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: The combustion chambers of the engine are surrounded by pockets.
sentences.cn: 发动机的燃烧室被凹槽围绕着.

sentences.en: The energy is released by combustion on the application of a match.
sentences.cn: 能量通过点火柴燃烧释放出来。

sentences.en: The first internal combustion engines ran on the previously discarded gasoline.
sentences.cn: 早期的内燃机依靠原先弃置不用的汽油而运转.

sentences.en: The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion.
sentences.cn: 量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应.

sentences.en: The principal sources are stationary combustion plants and transportation vehicles.
sentences.cn: 主要来源是工厂的固定燃烧和运输车辆.

sentences.en: The two principal combustion products are water vapor and carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 两种主要的燃烧产物是水蒸气和二氧化碳。

sentences.en: This inhibiting of flow oscillations adds stability to the combustion chamber.
sentences.cn: 对流动振荡的这种抑制作用提高了燃烧室的稳定性.

words.tran_cn: 易燃的；易激动的；燃烧性的

phrases.tran_cn: 燃烧过程的控制，燃烧控制
内燃机；燃烧机；内燃机燃烧机
